entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Val Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val Marie 07:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: S 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:20 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 07:20 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
